languages.text: "Кто это с тобой? Блюститель и ткач?! Ты смерти моей захотел?! Если кто увидит, что я с вами болтаю, мне шею свернут! Уходите". {n}Торговец словами трепещет от страха за свою жизнь. Нужно извлечь из него ответы. Но как именно?{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Кто это с тобой? Блюститель и ткач?! Ты смерти моей захотел?! Если кто увидит, что я с вами болтаю, мне шею свернут! Уходите". {n}Торговец словами трепещет от страха за свою жизнь. Нужно извлечь из него ответы. Но как именно?{/n}

languages.text: "Who's that with you? An enforcer! And a spinner! Do you want me dead? If anyone sees me talking to you, they'll snap my neck! So, off you go." {n}The peddler of words is trembling in fear for his life. I must extract answers from him. But by what means?{/n}
languages.original_text: "Кто это с тобой? Блюститель и ткач?! Ты смерти моей захотел?! Если кто увидит, что я с вами болтаю, мне шею свернут! Уходите". {n}Торговец словами трепещет от страха за свою жизнь. Нужно извлечь из него ответы. Но как именно?{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Who's that with you? An enforcer! And a spinner! Do you want me dead? If anyone sees me talking to you, they'll snap my neck! So, off you go." {n}The peddler of words is trembling in fear for his life. I must extract answers from him. But by what means?{/n}

"Who is that with you? An enforcer and a weaver?! Do you want me dead?! If anyone sees me talking to you, they are going to snap my neck! Go away." {n}The peddler of words is trembling with fear. We need to nudge him toward cooperation.{/n}

"Who's that with you? An enforcer! And a spinner! Do you want me dead? If anyone sees me talking to you, they'll snap my neck! So, off you go." {n}The peddler of words is trembling in fear for his life. I must extract answers from him. But by what means?{/n}

"Who is that with you? An enforcer and a weaver? Do you want me dead? If anyone sees me talking to you, they will snap my neck! Get lost." {n}The peddler of words is trembling with fear. We need to nudge him toward cooperation.{/n}

"Who's that with you? An enforcer! And a spinner! Do you want me dead? If anyone sees me talking to you, they'll snap my neck! So, off you go." {n}The peddler of words is trembling in fear for his life. I must extract answers from him. But by what means?{/n}

"Who's that with you? An enforcer! And a spinner! Do you want me dead? If anyone sees me talking to you, they'll snap my neck! So, off you go." {n}The peddler of words is trembling in fear for his life. I must extract answers from him. But by what means?{/n}

"Who's that with you? An enforcer! And a spinner! Do you want me dead? If anyone sees me talking to you, they'll snap my neck! So, off you go." {n}The peddler of words is trembling in fear for his life. I must extract answers from him. But by what means?{/n}

languages.text: "Wer ist das da bei Euch? Ein Enforcer! Und eine Spinnerin! Wollt Ihr meinen Tod? Wenn jemand sieht, dass ich mit Euch rede, brechen sie mir das Genick! Also verschwindet." {n}Der Wortehändler zittert aus Angst um sein Leben. Ich muss ihm Antworten entlocken Aber mit welchen Mitteln?{/n}
languages.original_text: "Who's that with you? An enforcer! And a spinner! Do you want me dead? If anyone sees me talking to you, they'll snap my neck! So, off you go." {n}The peddler of words is trembling in fear for his life. I must extract answers from him. But by what means?{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wer ist das da bei Euch? Ein Enforcer! Und eine Spinnerin! Wollt Ihr meinen Tod? Wenn jemand sieht, dass ich mit Euch rede, brechen sie mir das Genick! Also verschwindet." {n}Der Wortehändler zittert aus Angst um sein Leben. Ich muss ihm Antworten entlocken Aber mit welchen Mitteln?{/n}

languages.text: «¿A quién traes? ¡A una guardia! ¡Y a una tejedora! ¿Es que quieres que me maten? Si me ven hablar con vosotros, ¡me romperán el cuello! Anda, marchaos». {n}El vendedor de palabras tiembla de miedo. Necesito sacarle respuesta, ¿pero cómo?{/n}
languages.original_text: "Who's that with you? An enforcer! And a spinner! Do you want me dead? If anyone sees me talking to you, they'll snap my neck! So, off you go." {n}The peddler of words is trembling in fear for his life. I must extract answers from him. But by what means?{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿A quién traes? ¡A una guardia! ¡Y a una tejedora! ¿Es que quieres que me maten? Si me ven hablar con vosotros, ¡me romperán el cuello! Anda, marchaos». {n}El vendedor de palabras tiembla de miedo. Necesito sacarle respuesta, ¿pero cómo?{/n}

languages.text: 「お前と一緒にいるのは誰だ？エンフォーサーか！それに織り手！俺を死なせたいのか？俺がお前と話してるのを見られたら、そいつに首を折られちまう！頼むから消えてくれ」{n}言葉を売り歩く男は身の危険を感じて震えている。奴から答えを引き出さなければならない。だが、どんな方法がある？{/n}
languages.original_text: "Who's that with you? An enforcer! And a spinner! Do you want me dead? If anyone sees me talking to you, they'll snap my neck! So, off you go." {n}The peddler of words is trembling in fear for his life. I must extract answers from him. But by what means?{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お前と一緒にいるのは誰だ？エンフォーサーか！それに織り手！俺を死なせたいのか？俺がお前と話してるのを見られたら、そいつに首を折られちまう！頼むから消えてくれ」{n}言葉を売り歩く男は身の危険を感じて震えている。奴から答えを引き出さなければならない。だが、どんな方法がある？{/n}

languages.text: “你身边的人是谁？是执法者！居然还有个织网者！你是想害死我吗？要是有人看到我和你说话，他们会拧断我的脖子！你赶紧走吧。”{n}情报贩子吓得瑟瑟发抖。我必须从他口中得到答案，但要通过哪种方式呢？{/n}
languages.original_text: "Who's that with you? An enforcer! And a spinner! Do you want me dead? If anyone sees me talking to you, they'll snap my neck! So, off you go." {n}The peddler of words is trembling in fear for his life. I must extract answers from him. But by what means?{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你身边的人是谁？是执法者！居然还有个织网者！你是想害死我吗？要是有人看到我和你说话，他们会拧断我的脖子！你赶紧走吧。”{n}情报贩子吓得瑟瑟发抖。我必须从他口中得到答案，但要通过哪种方式呢？{/n}

languages.text: « Qui vous accompagne ? Une prévôte ! Et une tisseuse, par-dessus le marché ! Vous voulez ma mort, c'est ça ?! Si les autres me voient en train de vous parler, ils vont me faire la peau ! Alors, fichez le camp. » {n}La voix du trafiquant suinte la peur tant il craint pour sa vie. Je dois lui extorquer des réponses. Mais comment ?{/n}
languages.original_text: "Who's that with you? An enforcer! And a spinner! Do you want me dead? If anyone sees me talking to you, they'll snap my neck! So, off you go." {n}The peddler of words is trembling in fear for his life. I must extract answers from him. But by what means?{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Qui vous accompagne ? Une prévôte ! Et une tisseuse, par-dessus le marché ! Vous voulez ma mort, c'est ça ?! Si les autres me voient en train de vous parler, ils vont me faire la peau ! Alors, fichez le camp. » {n}La voix du trafiquant suinte la peur tant il craint pour sa vie. Je dois lui extorquer des réponses. Mais comment ?{/n}

languages.text: "Bu yanındaki kim? İnfazcı mı? Bir de dokur getirmişsin! Ölmemi mi istiyorsun? Seninle konuştuğumu gören olursa boynumu kırıverir! Hadi git başımdan." {n}Sözlerin tüccarı, hayatı için korkarak zangırdıyor. Ondan aradığım cevapları almalıyım. Ama nasıl alacağım?{/n}
languages.original_text: "Who's that with you? An enforcer! And a spinner! Do you want me dead? If anyone sees me talking to you, they'll snap my neck! So, off you go." {n}The peddler of words is trembling in fear for his life. I must extract answers from him. But by what means?{/n}
